testcase.name: modelCheckingTest

failure.message:
org.jetbrains.kotlinx.lincheck.LincheckAssertionError: = Invalid execution results = | -------------------------------------------------------- | | Thread 1 | Thread 2 | | -------------------------------------------------------- | | cas2(0, 0, 1, 1, 0, 1): true | get(0): 1 | | | cas(1, 1, 0): false [0,1] | | | get(1): 0 [0,2] | | -------------------------------------------------------- |
--- Values in "[..]" brackets indicate the number of completed operations in each of the parallel threads seen at the beginning of the current operation ---
The following interleaving leads to the error: | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | Thread 1 | Thread 2 | | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | cas2(0, 0, 1, 1, 0, 1): true | | | cas2(0,0,1,1,0,1): true at AtomicArrayTest.cas2(AtomicArrayTest.kt:26) | | | get(0): AtomicRef@1 at AtomicArray.cas2(AtomicArray.kt:24) | | | getValue(): 0 at AtomicArray.cas2(AtomicArray.kt:24) | | | get(0): AtomicRef@1 at AtomicArray.cas2(AtomicArray.kt:25) | | | setValue(1) at AtomicArray.cas2(AtomicArray.kt:25) | | | switch | | | | get(0): 1 | | | cas(1, 1, 0): false | | | get(1): 0 | | get(1): AtomicRef@2 at AtomicArray.cas2(AtomicArray.kt:26) | | | setValue(1) at AtomicArray.cas2(AtomicArray.kt:26) | | | result: true | | | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
Detailed trace: | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | Thread 1 | Thread 2 | | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | cas2(0, 0, 1, 1, 0, 1): true | | | cas2(0,0,1,1,0,1): true at AtomicArrayTest.cas2(AtomicArrayTest.kt:26) | | | get(0): AtomicRef@1 at AtomicArray.cas2(AtomicArray.kt:24) | | | getValue(): 0 at AtomicArray.cas2(AtomicArray.kt:24) | | | get(0): AtomicRef@1 at AtomicArray.cas2(AtomicArray.kt:25) | | | setValue(1) at AtomicArray.cas2(AtomicArray.kt:25) | | | switch | | | | get(0): 1 | | | get(0): 1 at AtomicArrayTest.get(AtomicArrayTest.kt:16) | | | get(0): AtomicRef@1 at AtomicArray.get(AtomicArray.kt:11) | | | getValue(): 1 at AtomicArray.get(AtomicArray.kt:11) | | | result: 1 | | | cas(1, 1, 0): false | | | cas(1,1,0): false at AtomicArrayTest.cas(AtomicArrayTest.kt:20) | | | get(1): AtomicRef@2 at AtomicArray.cas(AtomicArray.kt:18) | | | compareAndSet(1,0): false at AtomicArray.cas(AtomicArray.kt:18) | | | result: false | | | get(1): 0 | | | get(1): 0 at AtomicArrayTest.get(AtomicArrayTest.kt:16) | | | get(1): AtomicRef@2 at AtomicArray.get(AtomicArray.kt:11) | | | getValue(): 0 at AtomicArray.get(AtomicArray.kt:11) | | | result: 0 | | get(1): AtomicRef@2 at AtomicArray.cas2(AtomicArray.kt:26) | | | setValue(1) at AtomicArray.cas2(AtomicArray.kt:26) | | | result: true | | | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
